p: Eligibility criteria were articles that: (1) were published in peer-reviewed journals from January 1957 to December 2014; (2) were studies with epidemiologic and/or serologic information (quantitative/qualitative) about incidence and prevalence of HFMD; and/or (3) contained information about factors associated with prevalence and incidence and/or (4) employed statistical models to derive the above. Articles not in English, not related to HFMD, or HFMD articles that did not cover epidemiologic or clinical factors were excluded.
